Subject: Progress of Mark Sweeney
Dear Sir,
Mark Sweeney has nothing more to prove at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an AVG of .307 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,

Subject: Kevin Stocker learns new position

learning his new position, Third Base.
I would rate his skills as "C" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director
